dict.acceptation: 乐意的，愿意的；自愿的，心甘情愿的；
will的现在分词；决心；用意志力驱使；

sent.orig: We're willing to display our technology to the public willing to accept all challenges.
sent.trans: 乐意把我们的技束公开展示给大家，乐意接受一切挑战。

sent.orig: Is willing your mind to blossom quietly, is willing our world to become an ecstatic world!
sent.trans: 愿你的心灵悄悄开花，愿我们的世界成为一个心花怒放的世界！

sent.orig: AMERICA'S government is a willing buyer of bad assets, but are its banks willing sellers?
sent.trans: 美国政府很乐意成为不良资产的买家，但是银行愿意成为卖家么？

sent.orig: Willing to work under huge pressure.
sent.trans: 愿意在巨大压力下工作。

sent.orig: Remarks: We are willing to answer friends question about Diamond Sutra.
sent.trans: 注：小店乐意回答朋友们任何有关金刚经的问题。
